item.description:
As Molly Malone's has very recently closed its doors, we're forced to go with the back-up location - Asia restaurant, on the south side of the Dover Point Bridge. I'm not overly fond of this place (the buffet is 12.00 and they shoo us out around 9), so please start e-mailing me suggestions for alternate locations for the next one.

See ya'll there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person who resembles my profile image, but ask at the entry anyhow!
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group September Meetup
